rooms.description: Two-car garage with ample space for vehicles, designed following Vastu guidelines where the entrance is aligned to the east.
Large open entrance hall welcoming the family, placed centrally on the ground floor as per Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow.
Spacious living room with high ceilings and exposed concrete elements characteristic of Brutalist architecture. Located in the eastern side to benefit from morning sunlight.
Functional dining area adjacent to the living room, designed for family gatherings and communal meals.
Modern kitchen with exposed concrete walls, strategically located in the south-west direction according to Vastu principles.
Small utility room for storage of cleaning supplies and kitchen appliances.
Primary bathroom on ground floor with efficient water drainage system; placed in the north-east to maintain privacy as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed with a heavy-duty metal frame, aligning with the Vastu requirement for an auspicious east-facing entry.
Garage entrance door integrated seamlessly with the house structure, ensuring smooth access while adhering to local building norms.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an attached balcony overlooking the garden. Placed in the north-west for better sleep as per Vastu.
Well-ventilated bedroom designed for additional family members, located on the west side.
Additional bedroom for joint family members; positioned in the north-east to balance energy according to Vastu.
Private bathroom attached to the master bedroom with modern fixtures and water-saving design.
Guest room on the first floor for visitors, designed with sufficient natural light and ventilation.

openings.description: Balcony entrance providing access to the rooftop terrace; positioned in a location that adheres to Vastu principles.

rooms.description: Large open space that can serve as a study area or family room with natural lighting from the rooftop terrace.
Rooftop terrace offering panoramic views and outdoor space for relaxation, designed with minimalistic landscaping.
